title: Summary report
description: This data entity provides metadata about the first mile farm data

exportDate.title: Export date
exportDate.description: Date when the data has been exported from the database into First Mile Export Format

dataProvidersGeolocation.title: Geolocation of the data provider
dataProvidersGeolocation.description: Location of the frontdoor of head office of the organisation that converted it's data into First Mile Export Format indicated by WGS84 Lat-Long Coordinates ddd.dddd

dataProvidersID.title: Legal registration number of the data provider
dataProvidersID.description: Legal registration number of the organisation that converted its data into First Mile Data Format

dataProvidersName.title: data provider name
dataProvidersName.description: Official name of the organisation that converted its data into First Mile Data Format

dataProvidersAdress.title: data providers lega; adress
dataProvidersAdress.description: The legally registered address of the organisation that converted it's data into First Mile Data Format.

dataProvidersPointofContact.title: data provider point of contact
dataProvidersPointofContact.description: Contact point of the organisation that converted it's data into First Mile Export Format

datasetDescription.title: Dataset description
datasetDescription.description: Description of the data set that is converted into First Mile Export Format

#groups.title: # of groups
#groups.description: Number of farmer group recordsin the dataset

#farmers.title: # of farmers
#farmers.description: Number of farmers in the dataset

#farms.title: # of farms
#farms.description: Number of farms in the dataset

#plots.title: # of plots
#plots.description: Number of plotrecords in the dataset

#cropObservations.title: # of crop observations
#cropObservations.description: Number of crop observation records in the dataset

#Persons.title: # of Persons
#Persons.description: Number of persons in the dataset

#households.title: # of Households
#households.description: Number of household records in the dataset

additionalDataEntities.title: Additional data entities
additionalDataEntities.description: Array of additional data entities added to the data model by customization

additionalDataAttributes.title: Additional data attributes
additionalDataAttributes.description: Array of additional data attributes added to the data model by customization

lineString.description: An array of two or more positions

linearRing.description: An array of four positions where the first equals the last

dataattributestructure.title: Data attribute structure
dataattributestructure.description: Data elements to describe a data attribute

dataEntiy.title: Title of the data entity
dataEntiy.description: Title of the data entity the data attribute belongs to

dataEntityStructure.title: Data Entity Structure
dataEntityStructure.description: Structure of the customized data entity

adress.title: address
adress.description: An address. This is the legally registered address of the organization.

streetAddress.title: Street address
streetAddress.description: The street address. For example, 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy.

locality.title: Locality
locality.description: The locality. For example, Mountain View.

countryName.title: Country name
countryName.description: The country name. For example, United States.

contactpoint.title: contact point
contactpoint.description: An person, contact point or department to contact in relation to this contracting process.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the contact person, department, or contact point, for correspondence relating to this contracting process.

email.title: Email
email.description: The e-mail address of the contact point/person.

telephone.title: Telephone
telephone.description: The telephone number of the contact point/person. This should include the international dialling code.

faxNumber.title: Fax number
faxNumber.description: The fax number of the contact point/person. This should include the international dialling code.

url.title: URL
url.description: A web address for the contact point/person.
